amendment.description: Amendment requires that the Surgeon General conduct a comprehensive review of published material and other information concerning the impact on the health and welfare of children and young adults of violent messages delivered through such popular media as television, video games, advertising, the Internet, and other outlets of mass culture.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 34 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to require that the Surgeon General conduct a comprehensive study on the impact on the health and welfare of children and young adults of violent messages delivered through the popular media, video games, advertising, the internet, and other outlets of mass culture.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 9 (Roll no. 225).
